pkgmetadata.longdescription: Management and Processing Tools for Data Produced by the Empatica E4 // Process and manage the data from the Empatica E4. All functions operate on the EDA data stream, but other streams will be added soon. The Empatica E4 is a wearable physiological monitor made by Empatica (Empatica is not associated with any of this code). You can find more information about the E4 at Empatica's website https://www.empatica.com/research/e4/.
